description:
A Telemedicine Tool to Improve Awareness and Diagnosis for Patients With Congenital Dyserythropoietic Anemia.

Algorithms and recommendations for diagnosis and management of congenital dyserythropoietic anemia (CDA).

This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Learn more.

This is a web service dedicated to Congenital Dyseritropoyetic Anemias. Our aim is to provide information to patients and their families, but also to provide doctors with specific tools for this disease.

Congenital Dyseritropoyetic Anemias.

CoDysAn collaborates with various Associations
name: CoDysAn
